code:
---
id: auth-metrics-flow
title: "SmartEdify – Auth Metrics Flow"
description: "Instrumentation path for login, refresh, and password recovery metrics across the auth lifecycle."
updated: 2025-02-14
tags: [Retail_OrderManagement]
---
flowchart TD
    subgraph Request[Retail_OrderManagement]
        L[Retail_OrderManagement]
        V[Retail_CouponSystem]
        H[Retail_Inventory]
        T[Retail_OrderManagement]
        R[Retail_OrderManagement]
    end

    L --> V --> H -->|ok| T --> R
    H -->|fail| F[Retail_PointOfSale]

    subgraph Metrics[Retail_OrderManagement]
        MS[Retail_PointOfSale]
        MF[Retail_PointOfSale]
        MR[Retail_OrderManagement]
        MP[Retail_OrderManagement]
    end

    R --> MS
    F --> MF

    subgraph Refresh[Retail_PointOfSale]
        C[Retail_PointOfSale] -->|reuse| RU[Retail_PointOfSale]
        C -->|clean| NI[Retail_OrderManagement]
    end

    T --> C
    RU --> MR
    PS[Retail_PointOfSale] --> MP

    classDef metric fill:#eef,stroke:#336
    class MS,MF,MR,MP metric
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
